portfolio.title: Marketing Analytics
portfolio.description: Data Project : Conducted a data-driven analysis of an online retailer customer engagement, conversion rates and marketing data, utilizing SQL, Python and Power BI.

portfolio.title: Airbnb Pricing
portfolio.description: Data Project : Analyzed a dataset of 90K listings from Airbnb Paris to understand the factors influencing accommodation pricing. Also gained insights into the commercial use of Airbnb and host competitiveness.

portfolio.title: Production Analysis
portfolio.description: Data Project :Conducted analysis on US Department of Agriculture production data using SQL to assess state-by-state production for each commodity and identify trends or anomalies.

portfolio.title: Car Sales Analysis
portfolio.description: Data Project : Conducted analysis on Car Prices and Year Resale Value for each car manufacturer in a dealership with Excel, and presented them as a report to a regional manager

portfolio.title: Protech
portfolio.description: Web Project : A Community Platform For A Scientific Association I Founded with basic informations and a blog
